mapper.insert: insert into enterprise_table(enterpriseId, enterprisePassword, enterpriseName, enterpriseEmail, enterpriseProfileName, enterpriseMobile, enterpriseNumber,enterpriseAddress1, enterpriseAddress2, enterpriseAddress3) values (#{enterpriseId}, #{enterprisePassword},#{enterpriseName},#{enterpriseEmail}, #{enterpriseProfileName}, #{enterpriseMobile}, #{enterpriseNumber},#{enterpriseAddress1}, #{enterpriseAddress2},#{enterpriseAddress3})
mapper.select: select * from enterprise_table where enterpriseId=#{enterpriseId} and enterprisePassword=#{enterprisePassword}
